org.trianacode.taskgraph

Class TaskLayoutUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.TaskLayoutUtils

  • public class TaskLayoutUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of utils for manipulating the location of tasks (as stored in their GUI_XPOS and DEPRECATED_GUI_YPOS parameters). Note that the methods here assume that visually all the tasks are zero width and height! The actual width and heigth of tasks should be factored in by the graphical engine.

      • replaceTask

        public static Task replaceTask(Task curtask,
               Tool newtool,
               boolean rename,
               boolean preserveinst)
                        throws TaskGraphException
        Replaces a current task with a new tool.

        Note that newtool is a task with no parent it is automatically disposed after the replacement task has been created.

        Parameters:
        curtask - the task being replaced
        newtool - the tool used to replace the existing task
        rename - true if the new task should take the same name as the existing task
        preserveinst - true if the new task should preseve the instance id of newtool
        Throws:
        TaskGraphException

      • resolveGroupNodes

        public static void resolveGroupNodes(TaskGraph taskgraph)
                              throws TaskGraphException
        Sets unconnected task nodes as group input/output nodes.
        Throws:
        TaskGraphException
